title: Michaelmas - A Holiday We Forgot About | History

media:group.media:title: Michaelmas - A Holiday We Forgot About | History
media:group.media:description:
In this video, we take a look at a forgotten holiday that was perhaps as important as Christmas or Easter, called "Michaelmas". We explore what it was, and why it may have disappeared.

Find us here too!
Patreon: www.Patreon.com/Fireoflearning
Lucinox – Our Science Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCM2dfLR3BR0CHuePEDtxAZw
